      TifParser()
      This default constructor should not be invoked, or it will throw an exception to prevent instantiation.

      This constructor creates an instance intended for parsing the specified TIFF image file.

      This constructor creates an instance used for parsing the payload data representing the Image File Directory (IFD) structures.

      • TifParser

        public TifParser()
        This default constructor should not be invoked, or it will throw an exception to prevent instantiation.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - to indicate that instantiation is not supported

      • TifParser

        public TifParser(java.nio.file.Path fpath)
          throws java.io.IOException
        This constructor creates an instance intended for parsing the specified TIFF image file.
        Parameters:
        fpath - specifies the TIFF file path, encapsulated as a Path object
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O problem has occurred

      • TifParser

        public TifParser(java.lang.String file)
          throws java.io.IOException
        This constructor creates an instance intended for parsing the specified TIFF image file.
        Parameters:
        file - specifies the TIFF image file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O problem has occurred

      • TifParser

        public TifParser(java.nio.file.Path fpath,
                 SequentialByteReader reader)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Constructs an instance used for reading the payload data contained in the specified SequentialByteReader object, providing read access. These data elements are mapped to Image File Directory (IFD) structures.
        Parameters:
        fpath - specifies the file path, encapsulated as a Path object
        reader - a SequentialByteReader object containing the segment data
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - In case of an I/O issue.

      • TifParser

        public TifParser(java.nio.file.Path fpath,
                 byte[] payload)
          throws java.io.IOException
        This constructor creates an instance used for parsing the payload data representing the Image File Directory (IFD) structures.

        Important Note: Use this constructor when handling JPG image files, as they support IFD structures too.

        Parameters:
        fpath - specifies the file path, encapsulated as a Path object
        payload - an array of bytes containing raw data within the Exif segment block
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O problem has occurred

    • Method Detail

      • readMetadata

        public Metadata<? extends BaseMetadata> readMetadata()
                                              throws ImageReadErrorException,
                                                     java.io.IOException
        Reads and processes a TIFF image file, returning a new Metadata object. Throws exceptions for any processing issues or non-TIFF formats are detected.
        Specified by:
        readMetadata in class AbstractImageParser
        Returns:
        a Metadata object containing extracted metadata
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the file is not in TIFF format
        ImageReadErrorException - in case of processing errors

      • getMetadata

        public Metadata<? extends BaseMetadata> getMetadata()
        Retrieves processed metadata from the TIFF image file.
        Specified by:
        getMetadata in class AbstractImageParser
        Returns:
        a populated Metadata object if present, otherwise an empty object

      • processDirectories

        private void processDirectories(SequentialByteReader reader)
        Starts the processing of the IFD structures, handling the required information until all directories have been read. It also ensures the TIFF segment data is checked beforehand for integrity.
        Parameters:
        reader - a SequentialByteReader object providing access to the payload data
